link.title: Region 9 Resources
link.script:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: This site has been created to provide teachers and parents in Region 9 with links to online sites and other resources they might use in the event of extended school closings due to Covid-19.

Teachers, please check with your district or campus administration before using these resources, to ensure they are in line with your local district response. If parents receive access to these materials, we would advise you to preview the items before using them with your child.
These resources have been collected from several sources.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.p: This page contains offers we have been made aware of from trusted sources.
Inclusion of services on this page does NOT mean Region 9 ESC endorses these services.
This page is provided for information purposes only to assist parents in possible location of internet services.
Please make sure you research these offers before accepting any offer.
Region 9 Education Service Center is not responsible for any misrepresentations on the part of companies or organizations listed.
